Package controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Valve
    Interprets a given Message.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    Controller class for coordinating Model and View to play a game of Reversi.
    NewGameValve
    Interprets a NewGameMessage, starting a new game of Reversi.
    PlacePieceValve
    Interprets a PlacePieceMessage to place a new piece on the board.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ValveResponse
    Responses that a valve may return MISS - Command not executed EXECUTED - Command executed ENDGAME - The game is over
